ygData.subject: Stats for a char
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm..ok here s a question then? Since I know that I will be playing within a month to two months I need to have a char, just in case my others are wiped out.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm..ok here's a question then? Since I know that
I will be playing within a month to two months I
need to have a char, just in case my others are wiped
out. So I am thinking Enchanter, Druid and yes the all
around basher Warrior. My question is this then. When
you start the char they ask you to put the points in,
so what is a good distrubition of these stats for
each char type listed here? Also for these char thypes
what are the better races? (I know for war the best is
Troll 'cause they get regen, but the faction sucks so I
might just go with Human.) Hmm..can't think of anything
else so I guess I'll go for now. *yawn* have to get up
early for work tomorrow. Night. The Raven
